TopicTitle: Show EVA jetpack fuel in Resources Tab

Articles.Content: Exactly as the title says, it would be nice to have a Kerbal's remaining amount of jetpack fuel show up in the Resources tab rather than having to right click on him.
I don't know why this doesn't exist already.

Or even have an indicator on the pack itself that glows green, yellow, orange, red,for 100%-75%>75%-50%>50%-25%>25%-0% respectively.

More glowey lights to look at!!
